Package org.zodiark.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Context
    A class that can be injected, using the Inject annotation and used for delegating class' creation by the ZodiarkObjectFactory
    EventBus
    A distributed lightweight event bus which can encompass multiple Service instances.
    Reply<T>
    A Service response to an EventBus.ioEvent(org.zodiark.protocol.Envelope, org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource, Reply) event.
    ZodiarkObjectFactory.Extendable<T>
    Handle implementation of class of type T
    ZodiarkObjectFactory.Injectable<T>
    Handle creation of object of type T
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnvelopeDigester
    An AtmosphereInterceptor that intercept requests and dispatch them to the EventBus when the request's body can be deserialized as a Envelope, or dispatched to Atmosphere for normal request like decoded chat.
    EventBusFactory
    A factory for retrieving an instance of EventBus.
    ZodiarkObjectFactory
    An AtmosphereObjectFactory that handles the injection of Zodiark's object.
    ZodiarkServer
    Boostrap classes that configure Atmosphere and NettoSphere.
